snippet.title: Cystic fibrosis free prescription call by Bristol MP
snippet.description:
Bristol / 11 April 2014
A Bristol MP, whose nine-year-old niece has cystic fibrosis, has joined cross-party calls for free prescriptions for people with the condition.
